price: كوم كسان چې له الله او رسول سره يې دښمني كوي هغوى په رېښتيا په خوار شوو (سرټيټو) كې دي.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yuḥāddūna al-laha warasūlahu ulāika fī al-adhalīna
